entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 12.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this afternoon. High 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. A few showers beginning after midnight. Risk of a thunderstorm overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
